verses.text: PEA na‘e mamafa ‘a e honge ‘i he fonua.
Pea ‘i he faifai pea ‘osi ‘enau kai ‘a e koane kuo nau ‘omi mei ‘Isipite, pea lea kiate kinautolu ‘e he‘enau tamai, ‘o pehē, Mou toe ‘alu, ‘o fakatau mai ma‘atautolu ha me‘i me‘akai.
Pea tali ‘e Siuta kiate ia, ‘o pehē, Na‘e mātu‘aki fakapapau kiate kimautolu ‘e he matāpule ‘o pehē, ‘E ‘ikai te mau toe sio ki hoku mata, ka ‘i ho‘omou omi mo kimoutolu homou tehina.
Kapau te ke fie tuku mai homau tehina ke ‘alu mo kimautolu, te mau ‘alu hifo ‘o fakatau ha‘o kai:
pea kapau ‘e ‘ikai te ke tuku mai, ‘e ‘ikai te mau ‘alu hifo: he na‘e lea mai ‘a e matāpule, ‘E ‘ikai te mau mamata ki hoku mata, ka ‘i ho‘omou omi mo homou tehina.
Pea lea ‘a ‘Isileli, Ko e hā na‘a mou ta‘e‘ofa pehē ai kiate au, ‘o fakahā ki he tangata ‘oku kei toe hamou tehina?

Pea na‘a nau pehē, Na‘e mātu‘aki ‘eke ‘e he matāpule kiate kimautolu, pea ki homau fāmili, ‘o pehē, ‘Oku kei laumālie ho‘omou tamai? ‘oku ai mo hamou tokoua? Pea na‘a mau fakamatala kiate ia ‘o fakatatau ki he ngaahi lea ko ia: he na‘a mau ‘alo‘alo‘iloa te ne pehē mai, Mou ‘ohifo homou tokoua?
Pea lea ‘a Siuta ki he‘ene ‘eiki ko ‘Isileli, ‘o pehē, Tuku ‘a e tama kiate au, ka mau tutu‘u ‘o ‘alu, ka tau mo‘ui ‘o ‘oua ‘e mate, ‘a kimautolu mo koe, mo ‘emau tamaiki foki.
Ko au hono talifaki; ko au te ke ‘eke ia ki ai: kapau ‘e ‘ikai te u ‘omi ia kiate koe, ‘o fokotu‘u ia ‘i ho ‘ao, pea te u hia kiate koe ‘o ta‘engata:
he ka ne ta‘e‘oua ‘etau fakatuai ni, pehē kuo mau foki mai ‘eni ko hono tu‘o ua.

Pea toki lea kiate kinautolu ‘e he‘enau tamai ko ‘Isileli, ‘o pehē, Ka kuo pau ia, pea mou fai eni; mou to‘o ‘a e ngaahi me‘a fungani ‘o e fonua, ‘o fa‘o ki ho‘omou ngaahi kato, ‘o ‘ave ha me‘a‘ofa ki he matāpule; ha me‘i paame mo ha me‘i honi, mo ha nekoti mo ha lātano, mo ha ngaahi fo‘i telie mo ha ‘ai:
pea ke ‘alu mo kimoutolu ha pa‘anga kehe, pea ko e pa‘anga na‘e fakafoki mai ‘i homou ngutu‘i tangai, toe ‘ave ia; na‘a ko ha matavalea:
pea ‘ave foki homou tehina, pea mou tu‘u ‘o ō, ‘o foki atu ki he tangata:

pea tauange mo e ‘Otua ko Sātai ke ne ‘ange ha fatu ‘oku ngaue ‘i he ‘ofa ‘i ho‘omou ‘i he ‘ao ‘o e matāpule, koe‘uhi ke ne ‘atu homou tokoua ‘e taha, mo Penisimani. Kapau ‘e fakamasiva au ‘i he ‘ave ‘eku fānau ka u masiva pē ā.
Pea na‘e to‘o ‘e he kau tangata ‘a e me‘a‘ofa ko ia, pea nau to‘o foki ‘a e pa‘anga lōua, pea mo Penisimani; pea nau tu‘u ‘o ‘alu hifo ki ‘Isipite, pea nau tutu‘u ‘i he ‘ao ‘o Siosifa.
Pea ‘i he vakai ‘e Siosifa ‘oku ‘iate kinautolu ‘a Penisimani, na‘a ne pehē ki he matāpule ‘o hono fale, ‘Omi ki fale ‘a e kau tangata na, pea tāmate manu ‘o teuteu; he te nau kai mo au ‘a ho‘atā.
Pea na‘e fai pehē ‘e he matāpule ‘o hangē ko e me‘a ‘a Siosifa: pea ne fakahū ‘a e kau tangata ki he fale ‘o Siosifa.

Pea na‘a nau manavahē ‘i honau fakahū ki he fale ‘o Siosifa: ‘o nau, pehē, Ko hono ‘uhinga ko e pa‘anga na‘e fakafoki ‘i he‘etau ngaahi tangai ‘i he fua omi, ko ia ia ‘oku fakahū ai ‘a kitautolu; koe‘uhi ke ne ‘ohofia kitautolu, ‘o puke kitautolu mo ‘etau fanga ‘asi ke ngāue kiate ia.
Pea na‘a nau ‘unu‘unu ki he matāpule ‘o e fale ‘o Siosifa, pea nau fakalea kiate ia ‘i he matapā ‘o e fale, ‘o nau pehē,
Fakamolemole, Tangata‘eiki, ka ‘oku mo‘oni na‘a mau omi mu‘a ke fakatau me‘akai:
pea ‘i he‘emau a‘u ki he mālōlō‘anga, ‘o mau to‘o ‘emau ngaahi tangai, tā na‘e takitaha ‘ene pa‘anga ‘i he ngutu‘i tangai, ‘a e kotoa ‘o ‘emau pa‘anga: ka kuo mau toe ‘omi ia ‘i homau nima ni.
Pea kuo mau ‘omi mo ha pa‘anga kehe ke fakatau me‘akai ‘aki: ‘oku ‘ikai te mau ‘ilo pe ko hai na‘a ne ‘ai ‘emau pa‘anga ki he‘emau ngaahi tangai.

Pea ne pehē, Mou fiemālie pē, ‘oua te mou manavahē; ko homou ‘Otua pē, ‘a e ‘Otua ‘o homou ‘eiki, kuo ne tuku koloa ‘i ho‘omou ngaahi tangai: na‘e a‘u kiate au ho‘omou pa‘anga. Pea na‘a ne ‘omi kitu‘a ‘a Simione kiate kinautolu.
Pea na‘e fakahū ‘a e kau tangata ‘e he matāpule ki he fale ‘o Siosifa, ‘o ne ‘ange ha‘anau vai, ‘o nau fufulu honau va‘e: pea ne ‘ange ha me‘akai ki he‘enau fanga ‘asi.
Pea na‘a nau teuteu ‘a e me‘a‘ofa ki he ha‘u ‘a Siosifa ho‘atā: he kuo nau fanongo te nau kai me‘akai ‘i ai.
Pea ‘i he hū mai ‘a Siosifa ki fale, na‘a nau ‘atu kiate ia ‘a e me‘a‘ofa ‘a ia kuo nau ha‘u mo kinautolu ki fale, pea na‘a nau tulolo kiate ia, ‘o punou ki he kelekele.
Pea na‘a ne ‘eke kiate kinautolu pe ‘oku nau lelei; pea ne pehē, ‘Oku lelei ho‘omou ‘eiki, ‘a e motu‘a na‘a mou lau ki ai? ‘oku ne kei laumālie?
Pea nau tali, ‘Oku lelei ho‘o tamaio‘eiki ko ‘emau tamai, ‘oku ne kei laumālie. Pea nau punou ‘o hū.

Pea ne hanga atu ‘o ne vakai ‘a Penisimani ko hono tehina, ko e tama ‘a ‘ene fa‘ē, ‘o ne pehē, Ko ena homou tehina kimui, ‘a ia na‘a mou lau kiate au? Pea ne pehē, Nga‘ata, ke ‘ofa ‘a e ‘Otua kiate koe!
Pea fakavave ‘a Siosifa; he na‘e ngaue hono fatu ‘i he ‘ofa ki hono tehina: pea na‘a ne kumi ha potu ke ne tangi ai; pea ne hū ki hono loki ‘o tangi ai.
Pea ne toki kaukau hono mata, ‘o ne hū atu ‘o ne fakama‘uma‘u, ‘o ne pehē, Teuteu ‘a e kai.

Pea na‘a nau teu kehe ma‘ana, pea kehe ma‘anautolu, pea kehe ma‘a e kau ‘Isipite na‘e keinanga mo ia: he na‘e ‘ikai lava ‘e he kau ‘Isipite ke kai fakataha mo e kau Hepelū; he na‘e tapu ia ki he kakai ‘Isipite.
Pea nau nofo hokohoko ‘i hono ‘ao, ‘o mu‘omu‘a ai pē ‘a e ta‘okete ‘i he tehina, pea nofo ‘i mui ‘a e kimui: pea na‘e tumu ai ‘a e kau tangata, ‘o nau fesiofaki.

Pea na‘e hiki ‘a e ngaahi ‘inasi mei hono ‘ao, ‘o ‘ave kiate kinautolu; pea ko e ‘inasi ‘o Penisimani na‘e hulu atu ‘i honau ‘inasi kotoa, ‘o lō nima. Pea na‘a nau inu, kae‘uma‘ā na‘e lahi ‘a e kava na‘e tufa meiate ia.
